data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Granada, Andalucía, Spain.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Granada, Andalucía, Spain
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Granada, Andalucía, Spain to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 892,870 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 62 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Granada, Andalucía, Spain.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 907,400 people living in the county of Granada.
Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the South Asian, general people.
Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the county of Granada.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Granada, Andalucía, Spain to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the county of Granada, Andalucía, Spain.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

location.name: Granada
location.people_groups_list: Arab, Lebanese, Jew, English-speaking, Moroccan, Arabic-speaking, Persian
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Arab, Lebanese (1,300), Jew, English-speaking (600), Moroccan, Arabic-speaking (1,700), Persian (2,700)
